articles.title: Kim Jong Il Commands Combined Tactical Exercises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Commands Combined Tactical Exercises

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il commanded the combined tactical exercises of KPA Large Combined Unit 630 honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					
					 After receiving a salute Kim Jong Il mounted the commanding post where he was briefed on the exercises and commanded the combined tactical exercises of the unit.
					
					 When the exercises started, a-match-for-a-hundred stalwart fighters stormed the enemy positions and carried out their duties under various situations, attacking and obliterating targets at a stroke.
					
					 The exercises strikingly demonstrated the firm determination of the servicepersons to mercilessly destroy provocateurs if they fire even a single bullet into the inviolable territory of the DPRK, and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification at any cost.  They also showed that not a single enemy can survive the unpredictable counterattack of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK which are carrying forward the shining traditions of the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 Watching the high-level exercises to which the Juche-oriented war tactics are applied, Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction with the fact that soldiers have been fully prepared to timely foil any surprise invasion by enemies and defend the socialist homeland as firm as a rock.
					
					 He highly estimated their successful exercises.
					
					 He repeatedly expressed satisfaction with the fact that the commanding officers of the large combined unit are rounding off their combat preparations with high innovative insight to handle manifold situations while keeping themselves abreast of modern military science and technologies and modes of combat actions.
					
					 He praised the soldiers for stirring up the hot wind for intensive exercises, saying they are acquiring combat rules applicable to an actual war by conducting effective exercises away from formalism with the revolutionary determination and enthusiasm to unconditionally attain the remarkably high goal of the exercises.
					
					 The army is under obligation to defend the destiny of the country and the nation with arms, he said, calling for intensifying combat exercises and perfecting combat preparations, cherishing that nothing is more important than combat preparations for the army.
					
					 The socialist homeland is impregnable as dependable soldiers as those of the large combined unit stand guard over it, ready to creditably carry out any combat order given by the party and the country at a moment's notice, he added.
					
					 It is essential to continue channeling big efforts into strengthening the KPA in order to accomplish generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche, the Songun revolutionary cause that was started in the thick forests of Mt. Paektu, he said. He urged soldiers to put spurs to increasing the military capabilities which represent the sovereignty of the country and the nation and state power, and thus increase the combat capabilities in every way so that a soldier can match a hundred enemies.
					
					 He then went round a company under KPA Unit 169 honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					
					 Going round a bedroom, education room, mess hall and other places, he learned about the military service of the soldiers.
					
					 Very pleased with the excellent conditions for military service provided to the soldiers by the unit, he called on the commanding officers to consider it as their noble moral obligation to take care of soldiers' life so that they can glorify their military service with feats without feeling any inconvenience.
					
					 He had a photo taken with soldiers of the large combined unit.
					
					 Holding hands of the commanding officers he asked them to do exercises well, saying that training is most important. He acknowledged enthusiastically cheering soldiers, wishing them success in the combat and political exercises for the new year.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Chairman of the WPK Central Military Commission Kim Jong Un and the staff members of the KPA Supreme Command.

articles.title: Experimental LWR Construction: FM Spokesman
articles.content:
Experimental LWR Construction: FM Spokesman

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement Wednesday on the DPRK's just nuclear activities for peaceful purposes:
					
					 The peaceful use of nuclear energy is the legitimate right of a sovereign state recognized by international law. It also serves as the only way for solving the acute electricity problem in the DPRK as it has vast nuclear energy resources. 
					
					 The DPRK made up its mind to build its own light water reactor according to its economic development strategy given that there was no prospect for getting LWRs whose delivery was promised from outside.
					
					 The construction of experimental LWR and the low enriched uranium for the provision of raw materials are progressing apace in reliance on solid foundation of the self-supporting national economy and the country's latest science and technologies making leaping progress.
					
					 The DPRK announced at home and abroad the every phase of its nuclear activities for peaceful purposes geared to the production of electricity because it had nothing to afraid of nor hide. It also clarified its flexible stand that any concerns that may arise may be discussed at the six-party talks and it can convince the world of the peaceful nature of those activities through the International Atomic Energy Agency.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies, however, groundlessly took issue with the DPRK's just nuclear activities for peaceful purposes, deliberately laying a stumbling block in the way of settling the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 They slandered the DPRK's peaceful nuclear activities while spreading the false stories of "suspicious enrichment in the past" and "nuclear spread". They are even making far-fetched assertions that those activities are a "violation" of the September 19 joint statement and a "stumbling block" in the way of realizing denuclearization.
					
					 The guarantee of the DPRK's right to the peaceful use of nuclear energy had been recognized as the prerequisite preconditions for denuclearization from the outset of the negotiations for settling the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula. That's why the U.S. committed to providing LWRs to the DPRK in the first article of the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework. It was also for the same reason that the respect for the DPRK's right to the peaceful use of the nuclear energy and the provision of LWRs were stipulated in the first article of the September 19 joint statement adopted in the six-party talks.
					
					 Countries outside the NPT are conducting nuclear activities for peaceful purposes. This is a stark reality.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the hostile forces are charging that the DPRK's independent construction of LWR and the uranium enrichment are contrary to the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. This is aimed to render illegitimate the DPRK's right to the peaceful use of nuclear energy and deter it from exercising the right.
					
					 The right to the peaceful use of nuclear energy is an issue vital for the sovereignty and development of the DPRK and, therefore, neither concession nor compromise should be allowed.
					
					 The present international situation proves that the unwarranted acts of taking issue with the legitimate right of sovereign states as well as tolerating their violation while reading other's face would entail catastrophic consequences.
					
					 The process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is undergoing turns and twists. This is attributable to the U.S. which is preoccupied with encroaching upon the DPRK's sovereignty and deterring the DPRK from making peaceful development while defaulting on its commitments and duties.
					
					 The September 19 joint statement stipulates the U.S. commitments to fundamentally ending the nuclear threat and hostile relations and building lasting peace mechanism on the whole Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The prospect for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula can open only when all the countries concerned honor their commitments in the joint statement on the principle of simultaneous actions.
					
					 The DPRK is ready to resume the six-party talks without preconditions and implement the joint statement in a phased manner on the principle of simultaneous actions.
					
					 Pressing unilateral demand on others while not doing what they should do can never be tolerated and the attempt to render the DPRK's peaceful nuclear activities illegal or delay them for an indefinite period will prompt resolute and decisive countermeasures.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Greets PM of Barbados
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Greets PM of Barbados

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim on Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Prime Minister of Barbados Freundel Stuart on its 45th independence day.
					
					 Choe in the message sincerely wished the prime minister greater success in his work for development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Meets Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Meets Lao Ambassador

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim met and had a talk with outgoing Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Chaleune Warinthrasak at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Order Conferred on Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Order Conferred on Lao Ambassador

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Friendship Order First Class was awarded to Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Chaleune Warinthrasak with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					
					 The ambassador extended firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their drive to achieve independent and peaceful reunification of the country and build a thriving socialist nation and contributed to developing the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Laos.

articles.title: KCNA to Shortly Start Chinese Service
articles.content:
KCNA to Shortly Start Chinese Service

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency will start posting news stories, photos and videos in Chinese on its website --http://www.kcna.kp-- from Dec. 1.
					
					 It is occasioned by the 65th anniversary of KCNA. It will contribute to boosting traditional friendship between the DPRK and China and promoting the understanding of the DPRK by a great number of Chinese speaking population.

articles.title: Kim Chaek Univ. Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
Kim Chaek Univ. Delegation Back Home

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Kim Chaek University of Technology headed by its President Hong So Hon came back home Wednesday after visiting China.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Marked

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Central Hall of Workers on Wednesday to mark the 30th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "The Working Class Should Become the Pivotal Force in the Struggle for Modeling the Whole of Society on the Juche Idea".
					
					 The work, published on Nov. 30, 1981, tells that the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea has successfully fulfilled its mission and duty under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea over the past years, and clarifies the tasks to be carried out by the trade union organizations and workers.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the GFTUK, workers and trade union members.
					
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the GFTUK Central Committee, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The Juche-oriented idea of President Kim Il Sung on building the trade unions has been brilliantly realized thanks to the energetic ideo-theoretical activities and wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the reporter noted, adding:
					
					 Attaching great importance to the work of the GFTUK, Kim Jong Il has energetically led it to bring abut a turn in its work.
					
					 The GFTUK has vigorously advanced towards accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the party and the leader and the workers and the members of the GFTUK have creditably discharged their honorable mission and duty they assumed before the times and history.
					
					 The credit for all the successes goes to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who put forward the GFTUK as a reliable helper of the WPK and the working class as a core force in accomplishing the cause of modeling the whole of society on the Juche idea.
					
					 The reporter called on the workers and members of the GFTUK to remain loyal to the Songun idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il and work continued miracles and innovations in production and construction under the torchlight kindled in South Hamgyong Province.

articles.title: National Symposium on Medical Science Held
articles.content:
National Symposium on Medical Science Held

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A national symposium on medical science took place at the Grand People's Study House from Nov. 28 to 30 to mark the 60th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "The Immediate Tasks before Health Workers". 
					
					 The symposium was divided into panels of surgery, internal medicine, Koryo medicine, hygienic and anti-epidemic work, pharmacy and fundamental medicine. 
					
					 The participants heard 380 papers dealing with the successes gained by scientists, teachers, researchers and health workers in their preventive and curative medical care service. 
					
					 Many papers were highly acclaimed for their high clinical significance and value in introduction.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary Film Studio produced new film "Amid the Drive for Pushing Back the Frontiers of the Latest Science and Technology" (1).
					
					 The film introduces successes made by officials, scientists, technicians and workers in various fields of the national economy in recent years true to the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology.
					
					 It shows high-performance CNC machine tools being produced at the renovated Huichon Ryonha General Machinery Plant.
					
					 It edits scenes showing scientific and technological achievements made by scientists and technicians including teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology and researchers in the field of bio-engineering who succeeded in the technology of converting blood type.
					
					 It also tells about the devoted efforts made by the workers and technicians of the Ryongyon Seashore Fish Farm to establish the sturgeon farming system.

articles.title: Military, Political Training in Matanggou Camp
articles.content:
Military, Political Training in Matanggou Camp

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The military and political training of the main unit of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) held in the Matanggou Camp from late in November 1937 till March 1938 under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung served as an occasion of invigorating the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Some of KPRA members, deceived by the propaganda of the Japanese imperialists, began losing confidence in the victory of revolution. Moreover, the army was rapidly expanded with many recruits.
					
					 In the summer of Juche 26 (1937), the President dispatched an advance group to Matanggou in Mengjiang County to build a secret camp and make preparations for the training.
					
					 After moving the unit to the camp, he convened a meeting to indicate the aim and tasks of the training, nominate lecturers and organize training groups.
					
					 "The Tasks of Korean Communists", "The Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland", "Guerrillas Manual" and other famous works written by the President were taken as teaching materials in the training.
					
					 The military training mainly included shooting practice.
					
					 He personally gave lectures for the trainees.
					
					 Later, the unit, which prepared itself politically and militarily through the training, successfully wound up the Arduous March, operation in Musan area and large-unit circling operation, moving up the day of the liberation of the country from the Japanese colonial rule.

articles.title: "Story of Sado Castle", Dance Drama Created by Choe Sung Hui
articles.content:
"Story of Sado Castle", Dance Drama Created by Choe Sung Hui

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The national dance drama "Story of Sado Castle", which was created by Choe Sung Hui in Juche 44 (1955), has been performed at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre by the National Folk Art Troupe. 
					
					 The drama breaks into five acts, eight scenes and epilogue.
					
					 It is based on a story that a fisherman-turned soldier and a daughter of the lord of the castle love each other, irrespective of difference in social status. When Japs invade the country, they organize a volunteers' army and fight the invaders to defend the country. 
					
					 The drama is interwoven with sword and other dances.
					
					Choe Sung Hui made a great contribution to the development of the country's dance art.
					
					 She wrote the script of the drama, undertook its choreography and direction and made all preparations like properties, costumes, stage decorations, lighting and underscores. She also performed as heroine of the drama. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung enjoyed the drama in August that year, highly appreciating it for vividly representing the Korean people's patriotic spirit displayed in defending the country from invaders.
					
					 Afterwards, he enjoyed the drama on several occasions with visiting foreign figures.
					
					 The drama was performed more than 80 times in other countries from mid-September 1956 to early 1957.
					
					When meeting dance creators in early April 2008, General Secretary Kim Jong Il suggested recreating the drama.
					
					 Thanks to his deep care, the drama, associated with a soul of the distinguished dancer who devoted herself to developing Korea's national dance, could be put on the stage again to mark her centenary birth anniversary.

articles.title: Fish Farm Managed by Kim Jong Hwan
articles.content:
Fish Farm Managed by Kim Jong Hwan

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Fish farming has made a rapid progress in the DPRK.
					
					 Many fish farms have appeared throughout the country to contribute to improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 Among them is the fish farm managed by Kim Jong Hwan.
					
					 The farm raises more than ten kinds of fish, including rainbow-trout and catfish, for servicepersons and people.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the fish farm some time ago and expressed satisfaction over its breeding fish in a scientific and technological way.
					
					Favorable Geographical Condition of Fish Farm
					
					 Kim Jong Hwan told KCNA that the farm has a spring spouting water, 400 liters per second on average in all seasons. Its temperature is 12-14 degrees centigrade.
					
					 Availing itself of quality and abundant water and geographical condition favorable for fish breeding, the farm also raises fish in a stream.
					
					Rainbow-trouts are raised in nine ponds built in tiers along the stream. The ponds double other ponds of the same acreage in fish production. 
					
					 The fish farm covers only scores of hectares but has more than 100 ponds of different sizes for cold and hot fresh water fish.
					
					 It also has several incubation ponds and feed processing facilities.
					
					         Fish Farming in Scientific Way and Production of Feed with
					
					             Locally Available Raw Materials
					
					 The farm raises fish in a scientific and technological way, while producing feed with raw materials available in the country.
					
					 The farm established a modern seed fish producing system and succeeded in raising sturgeon and catfish.
					
					 The rainbow-trout raising method introduced by the farm in the stream won a prize in the national scientific and technological festival. 
					
					 The farm also set up a ring-shaped cyclic system involving fish farming, stockbreeding and agricultural production.
					
					 The farm uses moss gathered from salt fields as feed, bringing the consumption of feed down to 60 percent. Moss contains a large amount of protein and microelements.
					
					 It also mixes feed with medicinal herbs to reduce the death rate of fish.
					
					 Kim Song Chol, an employee of the fish farm, said the farm has solved seed fish and feed issues crucial in fish breeding. "I feel very happy when I catch fish as big as forearm," he said.
					
					Determination to Contribute to Improving People's Diet
					
					 Kim Jong Hwan said it was President Kim Il Sung's desire to fully supply fish to the people. He vowed to boost the fish production by breeding good species of fish and utilizing the acreage of the farm in a three-dimensional way as instructed by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Hwang Chang Gil, an official of the farm, said he will contribute to bettering the people's diet by raising fish in a scientific and intensive way.
					
					Choe Son Hae, an employee of the farm, said she will work hard to get a good knowledge about fish breeding.

articles.title: Samil Wolgan, Revolutionary Publication
articles.content:
Samil Wolgan, Revolutionary Publication

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- December 1 marks the 75th anniversary of Samil Wolgan, a revolutionary publication. 
					
					 The magazine was the organ of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland (ARF), the first organization of the anti-Japanese national united front in Korea. 
					
					 President Kim Il Sung had attached great importance to press activities since he started the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.    
					
					 He was of the view that there was probably no other form of publicity and agitation more powerful than publications in their ability to quickly disseminate the same ideology and fight slogans among the masses at the same time, rally them and give them organizational and ideological training.
					
					 After founding ARF, the President planned to expand it extensively at home and abroad.  
					
					 But the activities for its expansion were very difficult for the limited number of operatives.
					
					 The President found out a solution to the shortage of operatives in distribution of a revolutionary publication.
					
					 He was sure that if a paper or magazine loved by the masses was published skillfully and distributed here and there, each issue could take the place of an operative.
					
					 When a secret camp was built in Mt. Paektu and a printing shop set up there, he launched the magazine immediately.
					
					 Though he was under the pressure of battles, he contributed articles to the magazine.
					
					 Since the inauguration of the magazine, the activities for expanding ARF had made a rapid progress.
					
					 Samil Wolgan played a big role in bringing about a great upsurge in the overall Korean revolution based on the anti-Japanese armed struggle.

articles.title: Pak Je Ga, Poet of Ri Dynasty
articles.content:
Pak Je Ga, Poet of Ri Dynasty

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Pak Je Ga (1750-1805) was a realist scholar and poet of Ri Dynasty.
					
					 Pak became a realist scholar under the influence of Pak Ji Won, a realist scholar and his teacher, and devoted himself to academic pursuits.
					
					 In 1790 he, together with Ri Tok Mu, Paek Tong Su and others, compiled Muyedobothongji, an illustrated book of martial arts, explaining 24 kinds of the Korean martial arts.
					
					 He called for developing agriculture, handicraft, commerce, trade, traffic and transport after making a study of the country's socio-economic situation and touring Qing Dynasty three times. 
					
					 He also wrote poems reflecting his philosophical viewpoint, as well as the unreasonable features of the feudal society, sympathy with the poor people, realistic view of the economic development and life of peasants.

articles.title: Minju Joson Hits at US Production of New-type Bombs
articles.content:
Minju Joson Hits at US Production of New-type Bombs

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Some time ago U.S. conducted a test of ultra supersonic flying bomb that is possible to strike anywhere of the world within an hour. Timing to coincide with this, it began to deliver bunker-buster, a new-type bomb for destroying underground structure, to its Air Force units.
					
					 Commenting on the fact, a news analyst of Minju Joson Wednesday says:
					
					 All new-type bombs, developed or deployed by the U.S., are for destroying military objects of the anti-imperialists independent countries including the DPRK and Iran.
					
					 It is the U.S. scheme to stifle the DPRK by force of arms at any cost and thus establish its military hegemony over Northeast Asia and create conditions favorable for realizing its ambition for world supremacy. To this end it seeks to put its strategy of preemptive attack on the DPRK into practice.
					
					 Such reckless military actions of the U.S. are aggravating the situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK has no other choice but to take due self-defensive countermeasures on the condition that the U.S. poses a serious threat to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is advised to clearly know that any military pressure and threat never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK doesn't fear for new-type bombs or any stronger weapons to be invented by the U.S. The victory of showdown can not be decided by military equipment.
					
					 It is foolish for the U.S., obsessed with "weapon almighty theory", to threaten with new-type weapons and the like the DPRK based on strongest single-minded unity in the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Authorities Wrecker of Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Authorities Wrecker of Peace

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- With nothing can the south Korean authorities cover up their true colors as wreckers of peace and outrageous warmongers who are getting hell-bent on anti-DPRK war moves, standing against the improvement of north-south relations.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The south Korean military war-like forces have staged large-scale war exercises against the DPRK in five islands in the West Sea, escalating the tension, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The maneuvers going on in south Korea every day allegedly to cope with "provocation" by someone are very dangerous in their purpose, nature, content and style.
					
					 Any war rehearsal aimed at other party is bound to invite military confrontation and war. The puppet warmongers' continued war exercises and persistent moves for military showdown with the DPRK are designed to check national unity and reunification and, furthermore, do harm to the fellow countrymen by force of arms. No one can vouch that such maneuvers will not lead to a war of aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces are daringly making such bellicose remarks as "strong chastisement" and "retaliation" to the DPRK while clamoring about "provocation" and "possibility of additional provocation" by someone in a bid to mislead the public at home and abroad. This was prompted by their heinous scheme to irritate the DPRK to take military counteraction and, under this pretext, to ignite a nuclear war for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The final aim sought by the south Korean conservative group is to realize "unification under the liberal democratic system", not the independent and peaceful reunification based on national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 It is clear that a nuclear war holocaust will be created if the south Korean ruling forces pursuing sinister design and seeking a way out in a war are allowed to run amuck militarily.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands Capitalist Society as Reactionary
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands Capitalist Society as Reactionary

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The working masses' desire to lead an independent life free from the capital domination can never come true in capitalist society, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					
					 It is an inevitable phenomenon that working people in capitalist countries continue to stage protests almost every day in demand of their vital rights and freedom, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 In capitalist society "democracy" is enforced for a tiny handful of the exploiters but dictatorship for the working masses. Capitalist countries advocate the bourgeois parliamentary system and multi-party system as a symbol of "democracy", but in actuality big monopolists control government behind the scene.
					
					 Genuine freedom can never be expected in capitalist society where the capitalist class rule over everything while the working masses are excluded from the political life.
					
					 In this society inequality in material life is getting more serious though a great abundance of material wealth is produced. The poor are getting ever poorer and the rich ever richer. This is the reality of capitalist society.
					
					 Capitalism is a rotten and ailing society as it is "heaven" for the rich but it is "hell" for the poor. It is quite natural that such society has been rejected by the people.
					
					 The growth of capitalist material wealth is widening the gap between the rich and the poor, bringing capitalism into bottomless crisis.
					
					 Now is the era of independence in which the popular masses have become masters of their own destinies and put the world under their control. This shows it is the law governing development of history that a society based on individualism goes over to a society based on collectivism.

articles.title: KCNA Rebukes US Human Rights Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Rebukes US Human Rights Racket against DPRK

					  Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The United States recently held in Washington "a meeting of foreign policy-makers who are concerned about human rights situation in north Korea."
					
					 This is an imprudent behavior of the worst human rights abuser.
					
					 The U.S. styles itself a human rights judge in the international arena. It is ridiculous for it to take issue with human rights performance in other country as it ruthlessly abuses rights of the Occupy Wall Street demonstrators in the U.S.
					
					 One should be righteous before admonishing others.
					
					 The U.S. is troubled by human rights issue as proven by the Occupy Wall Street demo.
					
					 Political freedom and democracy are restricted in the U.S. legally and institutionally.
					
					 Elementary right to existence is not guaranteed and the rich get richer and the poor poorer as the days go by, becoming a problem plaguing the society.
					
					 In actually, the gap between the rich and poor has become most serious in recent years in the U.S.
					
					 Poor mental and cultural life is fostered institutionally, driving people into degeneration, despair and crime.
					
					 Isn't the U.S. a country with poor human rights as all sorts of evils including gun-related and drug crimes stalk throughout the land.
					
					 It is preposterous for the U.S. to take issue with someone's "human rights issue."
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the U.S. in kicking up the human rights racket.
					
					 It regards the independent countries as a thorn in the flesh and is kicking up human rights racket in international arena to tarnish the image of the DPRK.
					
					 Those in the U.S. who approach the DPRK with hostility had better face up to the human rights situation in the DPRK with reason. 
					
					 In a word, "human rights issue" does not exist in the DPRK.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the DPRK government to promote the well-being of the people.
					
					 All the people are fully enjoying genuine freedom and rights thanks to the popular policy of the state which guarantees their rights in a responsible manner.
					
					 The whole country forms a big harmonious family in which all the people help and lead each other forward. The U.S. is set to deceive the world through another "human rights offensive" against the DPRK, but people of other countries have not shut their eyes.
					
					 The U.S. is well advised to immediately stop speaking ill of human rights situation in the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korea's Farce to Suppress Candlelight Rally Censured
articles.content:
S. Korea's Farce to Suppress Candlelight Rally Censured

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Candlelight actions of south Koreans from all walks of life against the traitorous and shackling U.S.-south Korea "Free Trade Agreement" are sweeping south Korea.
					
					 Much upset by this, the south Korean group of traitors orchestrated a despicable farce.
					
					 Masses and figures of opposition parties held a candlelight rally in front of the Sejong Cultural Center in Seoul on Nov. 26 denouncing the "Grand National Party" for railroading the motion calling for ratification of FTA.
					
					 A great number of police encircled the venue of the rally. But the participants vied with each other to take the floor, strongly denouncing the puppet authorities for signing up the agreement.
					
					 The chief of the Jongro Police Station in Seoul stormed the venue unexpectedly.
					
					 A man in his 50s checked the chief, wrapping the chief's head with his hands.
					
					 The chief directly went to the police substation where he held a press conference and blared that citizens committed violence against him.
					
					 The puppet Seoul District Police Agency disclosed photos of violence and distributed them to media outlets.
					
					 The conservative media busied themselves describing citizens as rioters and distorting the meaning of the candlelight actions.
					
					 The puppet chief executive held a meeting of chief secretaries on Nov. 28, talking about "threat to democracy."
					
					 The puppet prime minister said it can never be justified under any circumstances and cried out for taking resolute and stern counteraction against illegal and violent demonstrations that challenge the power according to law and principles.
					
					 The security authorities hatched a plot to disperse the candlelight rallies and demonstrations, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere in the society.
					
					 Voice of People and other progressive media of south Korea disclosed that a man who was blamed to have assaulted the chief in the photo, which the chief presented as evidence, was a detective of the Jongro Police Station, not a participant in the rally.
					
					 Jong Tong Yong, executive chairman of the Democratic Party, Ri Jong Hui, representative of the Democratic Labor Party, who participated in the candlelight rally termed it a trite hoax of the present "government", raising suspicious points as to the behavior of the police chief.
					
					 This has brought to light the truth behind the farce the puppet group orchestrated by putting the chief of the Jongro Police Station and the detective into use.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Maneuvers in West Sea
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Maneuvers in West Sea

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Warmongers of south Korea staged big maneuvers for simulated attack on the DPRK in the West Sea of Korea on Tuesday, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					
					 Some days ago they had large-scale anti-DPRK war exercises on five islands in the West Sea of Korea and their surrounding waters one year after the Yonphyong Island shelling.
					
					 In the maneuvers they conducted a drill of mounting strikes on the DPRK, even firing live shells and bullets with involvement of huge armed forces of the three services including destroyers, escort ships, patrol ships, speedboats, tactical planes and helicopters while vociferating about "someone's infiltration".
					
					 This is a revelation of the bellicose nature of the south Korean authorities seeking to use the non-existent "northern limit line" as fuse of a new war by persisting in it. 
					
					 The group of traitors running amuck, oblivious of the lesson from the defeat it suffered in the Yonphyong Island shelling incident, will surely face a stern punishment by history for such crimes.

articles.title: FTA Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
FTA Protested in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally was held in Seoul on Nov. 28 amid protests against the U.S.-south Korea "Free Trade Agreement" sweeping south Korea every day.
					
					 Attending it were thousands of people from all walks of life including members of civic and social organizations, personages of opposition parties, workers, peasants, religionists and youth and students.
					
					 The participants said that the "motion calling for the ratification of the FTA" railroaded by the "Grand National Party" is peppered with poisonous articles reflecting unilateral interests of the U.S. only.
					
					 They called for bringing Kim Jong Hun, chief of the trade negotiations headquarters, and others related to the negotiations to justice without fail.
					
					 They termed the present chief executive the chieftain who had the motion railroaded.
					
					 Noting that the present regime is digging its own grave through the conclusion of the FTA, they warned that the chief executive can not live in peace even a single day even after he leaves the office as the successive dictators did.
					
					 They called on different circles to rise up to force the treacherous regime to step down.

articles.title: Macedonian President Meets DPRK Ambassador
articles.content:
Macedonian President Meets DPRK Ambassador

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- I hope that many-sided relations of cooperation between the two countries would expand, said Macedonian President Gjorgje Ivanov on November 25 when meeting DPRK Ambassador to his country Ju Wang Hwan.
					
					 The bilateral relations have a long tradition, the president said, adding that Macedonia is ready to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK in various fields including the economy and culture.
					
					 He hoped that the tension on the Korean Peninsula would be eased as early as possible.

articles.title: Swiss Hail Report of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Swiss Hail Report of KPA Supreme Command

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on November 25 in support of the report of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The KPA Supreme Command in the report gave a warning to the south Korean military forces staging grave military provocation campaign, the statement noted, saying:
					
					 Recently the provokers threatened to take "perfect readiness for counteraction" to KPA's military action for defending the territory of the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from last year's Yonphyong Island shelling.
					
					 The Yonphyong Island shelling last year was a legitimate self-defensive measure of the KPA.
					
					 If the south Korean warmongers dare impair the dignity of the DPRK and fire one bullet or shell toward its inviolable territorial waters, sky and land, the deluge of fire on Yonphyong Island will lead to that in Chongwadae for sweeping away the stronghold of the group of traitors following the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK revolutionary armed forces are in full readiness to go into a decisive battle to counter any military provocation.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea fully support the self-defensive measures taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: Peruvian Figure Denounces US Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Peruvian Figure Denounces US Hostile Policy toward DPRK

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The curator of Kim Jong Suk Library of Peru issued a statement on November 13 denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula was spawned by the U.S. posing a constant threat to the sovereignty and security of the Korean people, the curator said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. should not interfere in the internal affairs of the DPRK but drop the hostile policy toward it.
					
					 We congratulate the Korean people on having secured self-defensive deterrent in face of the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 We fully support the principled stand of the DPRK to resume the six-party talks without preconditions as early as possible and implement in an overall and balanced way the September 19 Joint Statement on the principle of simultaneous actions and thus realize denuclearization of the whole Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: US-Russia Confrontation Deepens over MD in Europe
articles.content:
US-Russia Confrontation Deepens over MD in Europe

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The contradiction between Russia and the U.S. has festered over the U.S. missile defense system (MD) in Europe.
					
					 Dmitri Medvedev, in a special TV show on Nov. 23, declared that Russia will take tough measures to respond to the U.S. moves to build a missile shield.  
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. made lame excuses that MD in Europe will never pose threat to the strategic deterrent of Russia. It also asserted that it has taken an open-hearted attitude to Russia as regards the MD project. 
					
					 The U.S. and NATO have pressed for building a missile shield despite the strong protest from Russia.
					
					 Romania, Poland, Turkey and Spain have already joined the U.S.-led MD.
					
					 This stocked Russia's uneasiness and fears. 
					
					 The Russian government expressed concern several times over the U.S. rapid and planned moves to build a missile shield in Europe, while demanding it give assurances of legal binding that the MD will never be used against Russia. 
					
					 It also warned that if the U.S. continues to push ahead with the MD, while not taking into account the interests of Russia, the army of Russia will take military countermeasures.  It may spark off a new arms race in the long run, it deplored. 
					
					 In case the negotiations with the U.S. over establishment of the MD in Europe break down, Russia is set to review the possibility of deploying missile complex "Iskander" not only within its territory but in Belarus. 
					
					 A Russian military expert said intercontinental ballistic missile complexes in his country will be equipped with hardware capable of intercepting any missile defense system. 
					
					 The world public concerns have grown that the U.S.'s reckless MD moves are sparking off another Cold War and a new arms race on the earth.

articles.title: GPS Satellite Launched in Russia
articles.content:
GPS Satellite Launched in Russia

					 Moscow, November 29 (KCNA) -- Russia launched "Glonas-M", a Glonas GPS satellite, into the space on Nov. 28.
					
					 The satellite lifted by carrier rocket "Soyuz-2.1B" blasted off from the Plesetsk Space Launching Site to accurately enter its preset orbit.
					
					 This was clarified by a spokesman for the Space Armed Forces of Russia.

articles.title: Iran's Armed Forces Warn Enemies against Aggression Moves
articles.content:
Iran's Armed Forces Warn Enemies against Aggression Moves

					 Tehran, November 29 (KCNA) -- The Staff of the General Command of Armed Forces of Iran in a statement on the Navy Day on Nov. 26 warned the enemies against their moves for aggression on the country.
					
					 The U.S. and the Zionist regime should clearly know the strategic intention of Iran and abandon a dream for aggression on its territorial waters and land, the statement said.
					
					 If the enemies, oblivious of this, invade the territorial waters and land of Iran, its Armed Forces will deal a prompt and merciless retaliatory strike on them, it noted.
					
					 The mission of the Iran's Navy is to protect the interests of the country in the territorial waters of Iran and international waters, it said, adding: The Iran's Navy will intensify its advance into the open sea.

articles.title: Sri Lankan President Opens Country's First Highway
articles.content:
Sri Lankan President Opens Country's First Highway

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Sri Lankan president on Sunday declared opening the country's first highway.
					
					 President's media reported that President Mahinda Rajapaksa ceremoniously opened the highway in the southern part of the country.
					
					 The 95km highway connects the capital Colombo and southern city of Galle. 
					
					 The government hopes it will contribute to growth of better logistics, mitigation of traffic congestion, and promote regional economic development.

articles.title: Chilean President Sets Cultural Policy Goals for 2011-2016
articles.content:
Chilean President Sets Cultural Policy Goals for 2011-2016

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Chile is paying efforts to protecting cultural heritage.
					
					 Chilean President Sebastian Pinera on Thursday announced a series of "cultural policy" goals for the 2011-2016 period, seeking to protect Chile's cultural heritage.
					
					 Pinera said the cultural policy plan is a well-established program with 14 concrete goals including initiatives about donations for cultural events.

articles.title: Ghana to Take Step for Economic Development
articles.content:
Ghana to Take Step for Economic Development

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Ghana will roll out a National Export Strategy and National Export Development Programme next year to transform the economy to a diversified and industrial one. 
					
					 The move is to wean the economy off its dependency on agricultural export commodities to one with a broader base and increase the export of varieties of industrial goods, craftworks, etc.

articles.title: Iran to Promote Development of New Armed Equipment
articles.content:
Iran to Promote Development of New Armed Equipment

					 Tehran, November 29 (KCNA) -- Iran is working hard to develop and deploy new armed equipment to cope with the enemies' moves for aggression.
					
					 The minister of Defence and Armed Forces Logistics of Iran in a recent interview with a news agency said that Iran will briefly manufacture new air defense equipment. 
					
					 The army and people of Iran are fully prepared to cope with any military attack of the enemies, he stressed.

articles.title: Cooperation among Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Countries

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- China and Cuba agreed to boost bilateral cooperation on biotechnology on Nov. 25.
					
					 That day Nicaragua and Vietnam signed a political cooperation agreement.

articles.title: 2 More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
2 More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers in Afghanistan met deaths due to the attack of the resistance forces of the country.
					
					 A NATO soldier was killed in restive southern Afghanistan region on Saturday. 
					
					 Another NATO soldier lost his life in the eastern region on Sunday,
					
					 Over 530 NATO soldiers, most of them Americans, have been killed in Afghanistan so far this year.

articles.title: ALBA Steadily Advances along Road of Independence
articles.content:
ALBA Steadily Advances along Road of Independence

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Member states of the ALBA have adhered to the stand for independence and socialism against imperialism under the banner of cooperation and unity.
					
					 Seven years has passed since Cuba and Venezuela formed the ALBA, a regional body, rejecting the U.S. demand for establishment of America Free Trade Zone ruled by itself.
					
					 This organization's idea of independence against the U.S. enjoyed support from regional countries and the number of its member nations increased to nine including Nicaragua, Bolivia and Ecuador.
					
					 Hugo Chavez Frias, president of Venezuela, underlined the need to make steady advance under the banner of socialism, stating that unity of the ALBA members is "the road to socialism in the 21st century".
					
					 Closely rallied in the idea of independence, the ALBA members have made a signal progress in social and economic fields, especially in abolition of illiteracy, through active mutual cooperation and exchange.
					
					 ALBA Fishery Company began to run in March 2009 and ALBA Medical Care Center was opened in Miranda State, Venezuela, in October that year.
					
					 The ALBA members have used common currency, Sucre, in their trade from January 1, 2010, as a step for the economic integration.
					
					 A document on founding ALBA-multinational food company was adopted in February 2010 to solve the food problem and develop agriculture.
					
					 They set up a ministerial committee for ensuring sex equality and are making joint efforts to encourage women to take an active part in building a new society. They also founded an ALBA ministerial committee for mutual cooperation in the field of environmental protection.
					
					 They are valiantly standing against the U.S. interference and military domination with their united efforts.
					
					 Their steady struggle for independence and socialism against the U.S. under the banner of unity and cooperation will surely result in good fruition.

articles.title: Economy of West in Tight Corner
articles.content:
Economy of West in Tight Corner

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The summit meeting of the Group of Twenty recently took place in the French resort city of Cannes.
					
					 It was held at the time when different opinions were raised on the existence of Eurozone due to the worst crisis in the European financial field and serious debt crisis in Greece, Italy and some other countries in particular.
					
					 Its main agenda items were such matters to remove factors of dislocating world financial market, reform the international monetary system, prevent unemployment, inflation, skyrocketing of prices of food and goods and eliminate world poverty. 
					
					 However, Western countries at the meeting attempted to get a huge amount of emergency relief fund from China and Brazil, shifting the blame for financial crisis and instability of world economy on the exchange rate system of China.
					
					 But, the BRICS and other developing countries stated that European countries should tide over their debt crisis by themselves, not with help of fund from China or Brazil. 
					
					 They also stressed the need to strengthen South-South cooperation and take a concerted action to establish a new fair international economic order in order to cope with the debt crisis in Western countries confusing the financial market. 
					
					 After all, the meeting came to an end without finding any way for establishment of fair international economic order, a key to settling the crisis, because Western countries chiefly responsible for it were busy evading their duty over the issue of sharing of emergency relief fund.

articles.title: Ecuadorian President Calls for Democratization of UN
articles.content:
Ecuadorian President Calls for Democratization of UN

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- The Ecuadorian president in a recent press conference called for the democratization of the United Nations.
					
					 He accused some countries of exercising veto at will while styling themselves world gendarme or coordinator in the UNSC.
					
					 In order to revamp such an undemocratic system countries should pool their efforts, he stressed.

articles.title: Pakistani FM Condemns NATO Air Raid
articles.content:
Pakistani FM Condemns NATO Air Raid

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- Pakistani Foreign Minister Hina Rabbani Khar, speaking with U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton by phone early Sunday, condemned the NATO for its air raid.
					
					 NATO helicopters attacked a military checkpoint in northwest Pakistan on Saturday, killing 24 Pakistani soldiers. The foreign minister described it as an unpardonable act of encroaching upon the sovereignty of his country and violating international law.
					
					 Saying it plunges the nation's relationship with the United States into deeper crisis, the foreign minister asked the U.S. to vacate the Shamsi air base within 15 days.

articles.title: Quakes Hit Indonesia and Papua New Guinea
articles.content:
Quakes Hit Indonesia and Papua New Guinea 

					 Pyongyang, November 30 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 6.3 on the Richter scale rocked Bali Island of Indonesia. 
					
					 On the same day an earthquake measuring 6.3 on the Richter scale hit New Ireland island of Papua New Guinea with epicenter at 850 km northeast of Port Moresby.

articles.title: Iranian President Calls for Unity of All People
articles.content:
Iranian President Calls for Unity of All People

					 Tehran, November 29 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad on Nov. 25 called upon all the people to get united to cope with the U.S. and West's sanctions.
					
					 They are resorting to the sanctions against Iran over its nuclear activities for peaceful purpose, he said, adding they have always sought the hostile policy toward the Iranian people.
					
					 We should not harbor an illusion about the enemies, he stressed. The army and people of Iran should get united to shatter the enemies' moves, he declared.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige entrenamiento tactico de gran unidad 630 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige entrenamiento tactico de gran unidad 630 del EPC

					Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento tactico conjunto de la gran unidad combinada 630 del EPC con el titulo del Septimo Regiminto de O Jung Hup. 
					
					Tras recibir el parte de recepcion, subio al puesto de mando donde escucho las explicaciones sobre la programacion del entrenamiento y lo dirigio. 
					
					Una vez iniciado el entrenamiento, los militares capaces del combate uno vs. cien alcanzaron con rapidez la posicion enemiga y destruyeron en breve los blancos cumpliendo habilmente sus misiones en diferentes circunstancias. 
					
					El entrenamiento demostro la decision resuelta de los militares de cumplir sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria al destruir implacablemente a los provocadores y agresores si estos se atreven a lanzar un solo obus hacia el sagrado territorio de la RPDC.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, hizo constar que ni un solo enemigo saldra ileso del imprevisible ataque de respuesta de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de Corea que dan firme continuidad a las brillantes tradiciones de la Guerrilla Antijaponesa. 
					
					Al ver el entrenamiento de alto nivel en que se aplican excelentemente los metodos de combate al estilo coreano, evaluo altamente los exitos alcanzados por los militares en la ocasion poniendose muy complacido de que ellos se hayan preparado para defender la patria socialista como muralla de acero frustrando a tiempo cualquier invasion sorpresiva de los enemigos. 
					
					Dijo con gran satisfaccion que los oficiales de la gran unidad combinada perfeccionan los preparativos de combate con vision innovadora previendo todas las contingencias posibles de acuerdo con la tendencia de las ciencias y tecnicas militares modernas y el modo de accion en el combate. 
					
					Aprecio el temperamento de entrenamiento de los militares quienes asimilan metodos de combate aplicables en la guerra de verdad, al realizar sustancialmente el entrenamiento sin formalismo ni dandismo y con la disposicion revolucionaria de alcanzar sin falta elevadas metas. 
					
					Los militares deben perfeccionar los preparativos de combate al intensificar el entrenamiento teniendo presente que eso es el quehacer mas importante para el ejercito que tiene el deber de defender el destino del pais y la nacion con los fusiles, destaco. Es inexpugnable la patria socialista gracias a los militares de la gran unidad combinada preparados para cumplir inmediata y consecuentemente las ordenes de combate que les asignen el partido y la patria.
					
					Para llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en la selva del monte Paektu, hay que seguir esforzandose mucho por fortalecer el EPC y consolidar por todos los medios la combatividad con que se pueda aniquilar a solas a cien enemigos al dar mas impulso al crecimiento de las fuerzas militares que significan la soberania del pais y la nacion y poder estatal, apunto.
					
					Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo recorrio una compania adscrita a la unidad 169 del EPC laureada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					
					En el cuartel, la sala de educacion, el comedor y otros lugares, el averiguo como los militares pasan el servicio militar.
					
					Satisfecho de que la unidad facilitara excelentes condiciones de servicio militar a los militares, dijo que los oficiales deben considerar siempre como su deber sagrado y noble obligacion moral hacer a los soldados coronar con meritos los dias de su servicio militar sin sentirse incomodos.
					
					Al final, se fotografio con los militares de la gran unidad combinada.
					
					Tras encomendar a los oficiales realizar bien los ejercicios apretandoles la mano, respondio a las efusivas aclamaciones de los militares formulando votos por los exitos en el entrenamiento de combate y politico del ano nuevo.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Jong Un, y los miembros de mando de las operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC.

articles.title: MINREX se refiere a actividades nucleares con fines pacificos
articles.content:
MINREX se refiere a actividades nucleares con fines pacificos

					Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 30 la siguiente declaracion sobre las justas actividades nucleares con fines pacificos del pais: 
					
					El uso de la energia nuclear con fines pacificos es el derecho legitimo de un Estado soberano, reconocido por la ley internacional, y es la unica medida para resolver el grave problema de electricidad en nuestro pais, que cuenta con abundantes materias primas para el respecto. 
					
					Dado que es muy oscura la perspectiva de la construccion de reactores de agua ligera, que debian ser ofrecidos por parte del extranjero a nuestro pais, tomamos la decision de construirlos por su propia cuenta segun la estrategia estatal de desarrollo economico. 
					
					A base del firme fundamento de la economia nacional independiente y de la ciencia y tecnica en desarrollo vertiginoso hacia la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta, se promueven a un ritmo acelerado la construccion del reactor de agua ligera de prueba y la produccion de uranio bajo enriquecido para abastecer de combustible. 
					
					No tenemos nada que vacilar ni disimular en  nuestras actividades nucleares pacificas para la produccion de electricidad, razon por la cual lo dimos a la publicidad por cada etapa. 
					
					Expresamos la posicion flexible de que si uno tuviera algo preocupante de ello, podriamos discutirlo en las conversaciones a 6 bandas o afirmar su caracter pacifico por conducto de la Agencia Internacional de Energia Atomica (AIEA). 
					
					Sin embargo, Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras acosan las justas actividades nucleares pacificas de nuestro pais y ponen obstaculos artificiales a la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana mediante el dialogo y las negociaciones. 
					
					Hablando de la "sospecha de haber enriquecido el uranio en el pasado" y de la "proliferacion nuclear", caracterizadas por fraudes y mentiras,  censuran nuestras actividades nucleares con fines pacificos y las califican de "violacion" a la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre" y "estorbo" en la realizacion de la desnuclearizacion. 
					
					Asegurar a la RPDC el derecho al uso de energia nuclear con fines pacificos fue reconocido como una premisa indispensable de la realizacion de la desnuclearizacion desde primeros momentos de las negociaciones para la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana. Es por eso que EE.UU. comprometio en el primer articulo del Acuerdo Basico RPDC-EE.UU. a ofrecernos reactores de agua ligera. Tambien en el primer articulo de la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre estan anotados el problema de respetar el derecho al uso de energia nuclear con fines pacificos de la RPDC y el de ofrecimiento de reactor de agua ligera. 
					
					En la actualidad hasta los paises al margen del Tratado de No Proliferacion (TNP) realizan las actividades nucleares con fines pacificos. 
					
					Sin embargo, las fuerzas hostiles pretenden impugnar la construccion independiente de reactor de agua ligera y las actividades de enriquecimiento de uranio de nuestro pais como las actividades que contravienen a la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana bajo la malsana intencion de invalidar y exterminar nuestro derecho al uso de energia nuclear con fines pacificos. 
					
					Puesto que esto es un asunto vital relacionado con la soberania y el desarrollo de nuestro pais, no podemos conceder ni un paso atras en ese tema ni cambiarlo con nada. 
					
					La actual situacion internacional muestra claramente que acarrearian una consecuencia tragica la tolerancia y la obediencia a las malsanas intenciones tendentes a cuestionar injustamente los derechos legitimos de Estado soberano y violarlos poco a poco. 
					
					El proceso de desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana sufre dificultades, porque EE.UU. se entrega a violar la soberania de la RPDC e impedirle el desarrollo pacifico, sin cumplir su compromiso y deber. 
					
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre estipula claramente el deber de EE.UU. de acabar fundamentalmente con la amenaza nuclear en toda la Peninsula Coreana, liquidar las relaciones hostiles y establecer el sistema de paz duradera. 
					
					Solo cuando todos los paises interesados cumplan con toda sinceridad segun el principio de accion simultanea sus deberes comprometidos en la declaracion mencionada, se abrira la perspectiva de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Estamos listos a reanudar incondicionalmente las conversaciones a 6 bandas y ejecutar por cada etapa la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre segun el principio de accion simultanea. 
					
					Pero, no puede ser permitido imponer a otra parte su demanda unilateral incumpliendo el deber asumido a si mismo. 
					
					 Las intenciones de ilegalizar nuestras actividades nucleares con fines pacificos o prolongarlas indefinidamente nos haran tomar las contramedidas rotundas y decisivas.

articles.title: Otorgada orden coreana a Chaleune Warinthrasak
articles.content:
Otorgada orden coreana a Chaleune Warinthrasak

					Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Fue condecorada la Orden de Amistad de primera clase de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a Chaleune Warinthrasak, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, quien expreso su firme apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha del pueblo coreano por la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria y la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista y contribuyo al desarrollo de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Laos.
					
					La ceremonia de entrega de orden tuvo lugar este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia la produccion de bomba de nuevo tipo de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia la produccion de bomba de nuevo tipo de EE.UU.

					Pyongyang, 30 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos realizo la prueba de bomba aerea supersonica capaz de bombardear dentro de una hora cualquier lugar del mundo. Coincidiendo con esto, comenzo a ubicar en las unidades aereas las bombas "Bunker Buster".
					
					El periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles, senala que estas bombas desarrolladas o distribuidas por EE.UU. son para destruir los objetos militares de los Estados independientes antiimperialistas como la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea e Iran, y continua:
					
					El intento de EE.UU. es tomar la hegemonia militar en la region del Nordeste Asiatico aplastando en lo militar Corea y ofrecer una favorable condicion a la realizacion de ambicion de la hegemonia mundial.
					
					Para este fin, el imperio intenta llevar a cabo su estrategia de ataque preventivo a la RPDC.
					
					Debido a los imprudentes alborotos militares de EE.UU. de aplastarla con el ataque preventivo, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se torna cada dia mas grave.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. amenaza gravemente la RPDC, esta se ve obligada a tomar las contramedidas autodefensivas en el nivel merecido.
					
					Aprovechando esta ocasion, la RPDC advierte fehacientemente a EE.UU. que no surten efecto la presion y la amenaza militares contra esta.
					
					La RPDC no teme la bomba de nuevo tipo y otros. La victoria o la derrota en el enfrentamiento no dependen de los equipos belicos.
					
					EE.UU. se atreve a quebrantar con las armas de nuevo tipo la unidad monolitica, lo cual no pasa de ser una accion ridicula de quienes estan enriquecidos por la "teoria de omnipotencia de armas".
